verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w Me|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* compels \w him|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* are \w to|strong="H3701"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*: gold, silver, and bronze;
blue, purple, and scarlet yarn; fine linen and goat hair;
ram skins dyed red and fine leather;\f + \fr 25:5 \ft Possibly the hides of large aquatic mammals\f* acacia wood;
olive oil for the light; spices for the anointing oil and for the fragrant incense;
and onyx stones and gemstones to be mounted on the ephod and breastpiece.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w Me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* must \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* design \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w* according \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*. The Ark of the Covenant (Exodus 37:1–5)

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w acacia|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w two|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* cubits long, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cubit \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cubit \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.\f + \fr 25:10 \ft The ark was approximately 3.75 feet long, 2.25 feet wide, and 2.25 feet high (114.3 centimeters long, 68.6 centimeters wide, and 68.6 centimeters high).\f*

\w Overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w inside|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w molding|strong="H2213"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Insert \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poles \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* order \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* poles \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* ark; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5715"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* inside \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ark \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*,\f + \fr 25:16 \ft The Testimony refers to the stone tablets in the ark of the covenant inscribed with the Ten Commandments; also in verses 21 and 22.\f* which \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. The Mercy Seat (Exodus 37:6–9)
